All in all, a great value and pleasant experience. I would recommend this site for a pleasant stay in Red Wing. The home's location is an easy walking distance to downtown.
The accommodations in Room #2 were perfect for our weekend in Red Wing for a wedding and hiking. Everything matches the photos and descriptions. No detail is overlooked. Check-in was easy. The bed was very comfortable. Room #2 uses the private bath a short way down the hall, no issues given one is the only guest in residence. (Pack a robe for your convenience.) There is a sink in the room with it's own light which is useful as a vanity mirror, teeth brushing, etc. The refrigerator and microwave are in the large closet; so convenient but not in the way nor spoiling the charm of the Victorian décor.
We were out and about most of the time. If you are a traveler spending more time in the room consider booking Room #4 which provides more space, such as comfy chairs for leisurely reading a book in the evening or a table for playing a game of cards with friends. The outdoor sitting areas are set in lovely gardens.
The hosts, Shelly and Rick, were prompt and friendly in all communications.
